009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
015import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
016import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
017import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
018
019public class Map_Translate implements PlugInFilter {
020        
021        static double dx = 5.25;
022        static double dy = 7.3;
023        
024    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
025        return DOES_ALL;
026    }
027
028    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
029
030                Translation2D imap = new Translation2D(dx, dy).getInverse();
031                new ImageMapper(imap, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
032    }
033
034}
